name: 2 beats
description:
• This is a roguelike game where you are a square and must avoid enemies
  • Every 2 beats you can switch directions, hold down arrow keys to choose direction
  • If an enemy hasn't fully formed you can touch it
  • I found a bug that I want to mention: you can move the square outside of the border, so please don't!
  • Also when you finish the game you go to a blank screen, that is a bug so you still win.
  • music by exorbiter https://www.instagram.com/exorbiter/
  • That's it, have fun!
